main event: A person reported seeing a metallic, shiny object that appeared to be hovering or moving in a slow, jerky manner over Yellow Springs, Ohio on July 24, 1968.
interesting points: The object had a dome shape and seemed to be reflecting sunlight.
There was no sound associated with the object.
The object appeared to be under intelligent control, as it changed course and speed.
The object was observed for approximately 10 minutes.
The report was made by a former USAF officer who was at home with their family.
sighted object: metallic, shiny object with a dome shape
witnesses: former USAF officer and their family
